info.author: Matt Papi
info.description:
See the GitHub repository (http://github.com/mpapi/lazylights) for more details.

Example
-------

.. code:: python
 from lazylights import Lifx
 import time
 
 lifx = Lifx(num_bulbs=2)  # so it knows how many to wait for when connecting
 
 @lifx.on_connected
 def _connected():
     print "Connected!"
 
 with lifx.run():
     lifx.set_power_state(True)
     time.sleep(1)
     lifx.set_power_state(False)
info.name: lazylights
info.summary: Python tools for controlling Lifx bulbs.
info.html_description:
See the GitHub repository (http://github.com/mpapi/lazylights) for more details.

Example
-------

.. code:: python
from lazylights import Lifx
import time

lifx = Lifx(num_bulbs=2) # so it knows how many to wait for when connecting

@lifx.on_connected
def _connected():
print "Connected!"

with lifx.run():
lifx.set_power_state(True)
time.sleep(1)
lifx.set_power_state(False)
